entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
